mapper.select:
SELECT ,
FROM rgdb."DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" LEFT JOIN
AS ON "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."shikibetsuCode" = ."shikibetsuCode" WHERE SUBSTRING("DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYukoKikanKaishiYMD",1,6) < #{処理対象年月} AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."yukoMukoKubun" = '1' ORDER BY "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."hihokenshaNo","DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYukoKikanKaishiYMD"

SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho" WHERE SUBSTRING("DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."idoYMD",1,6) < #{処理対象年月} ORDER BY "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."hihokenshaNo","DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."idoYMD"

SELECT J."hihokenshaNo", J."shikibetsuCode", J."jukyuYMD", J."shotokuNendo", J."juushotitokureigaitou", J."shotaishikibetsuCode", J."shotaihaakujukyuYMD", J."honninnkubun", J."kazeikubungennmenzen", J."kazeikubungennmengo", J."gekihenkanwasoti", J."goukeishotokukingaku", J."nenkinnshuunyuugaku", J."nenkinnshotokugaku", J."kazeishotokugaku", J."tourokugyoumu", J."shotaiinhihokenshaNo", J."honninkazeikubnn", J."shotaikazeikubun", J."shoubokubun", J."roureifukusikubun", J."shotokukubunCode", J."shotaishotokukubunCode", J."shotaiCode", J."seinenngappiYMD", J."zokugaraCode", J."setaiCode", J."seinengappiYMD", J."kazokuNo" FROM "SetaiYinShiyoTokuJyoHoTemp" AS J

SELECT A."被保険者番号", A."異動年月日" FROM "IdouChuukannKihonSofuIttokiTemp" AS A INNER JOIN "IdouTemp2" AS B ON A."被保険者番号" = B."被保険者番号" WHERE B."異動区分コード" = '01' AND A."異動年月日" <= B."異動年月日" AND B."エラーフラグ" = '1'

SELECT
FROM "SoufuError" WHERE ("SoufuError"."被保険者番号" = #{item.被保険者番号})

SELECT
FROM "SofuEraDetaTemp" AS "SoufuError"

mapper.sql: "SoufuError"."被保険者番号" as "被保険者番号", "SoufuError"."氏名カナ" as "氏名カナ", "SoufuError"."氏名" as "氏名", "SoufuError"."資格取得日" as "資格取得日", "SoufuError"."資格喪失日" as "資格喪失日", "SoufuError"."要介護状態区分コード" as "要介護状態区分コード", "SoufuError"."要介護認定申請日" as "要介護認定申請日", "SoufuError"."認定開始日" as "認定開始日", "SoufuError"."認定終了日" as "認定終了日", "SoufuError"."居宅事業者番号" as "居宅事業者番号", "SoufuError"."居宅適用開始日" as "居宅適用開始日", "SoufuError"."特定申請日" as "特定申請日", "SoufuError"."特定適用開始日" as "特定適用開始日", "SoufuError"."特定適用終了日" as "特定適用終了日", "SoufuError"."利用者負担申請日" as "利用者負担申請日", "SoufuError"."利用者負担適用開始日" as "利用者負担適用開始日", "SoufuError"."利用者負担適用終了日" as "利用者負担適用終了日", "SoufuError"."社会福祉適用開始日" as "社会福祉適用開始日", "SoufuError"."社会福祉適用終了日" as "社会福祉適用終了日", "SoufuError"."標準負担適用開始日" as "標準負担適用開始日", "SoufuError"."標準負担適用終了日" as "標準負担適用終了日", "SoufuError"."償還払化開始日" as "償還払化開始日", "SoufuError"."給付率引下げ開始日" as "給付率引下げ開始日", "SoufuError"."エラーコード" as "エラーコード", "SoufuError"."エラー内容" as "エラー内容"

select.id: select国保連インターフェース管理

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT3104KokuhorenInterfaceKanri"

WITH A AS ( SELECT 一時."被保険者番号" AS "被保険者番号" ,一時."異動年月日" AS "異動年月日" , FROM "IdouChuukannKooGakuIttokiTemp" AS 一時 INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho" ON 一時."被保険者番号" = "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."hihokenshaNo" AND "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."idoYMD" <= 一時."異動年月日" AND "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE ) SELECT
FROM ( SELECT mst.* ,CASE mst."dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_koikinaiJushochiTokureiFlag" WHEN '1' THEN mst."dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_koikinaiTokureiSochimotoShichosonCode" ELSE mst."dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_shichosonCode" END AS 対象市町村コード FROM A AS mst WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'x' FROM A AS slv WHERE mst."被保険者番号" = slv."被保険者番号" AND mst."異動年月日" < slv."異動年月日" AND (mst."dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_idoYMD" < slv."dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_idoYMD" OR mst."dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_edaNo" < slv."dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_edaNo") ) ) AS B INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" ON "DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster"."shichosonCode" = B.対象市町村コード AND "DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster"."gappeiKyuShichosonKubun" = '0' limit(1)
